definitions.definition: An ongoing winner in a game or contest.
examples: The defending champion is expected to defeat his challenger.

definitions.definition: Someone who is chosen to represent a group of people in a contest.
examples: Barcelona is eligible to play in FIFA Club World Cup as the champion of Europe.

definitions.definition: Someone who fights for a cause or status.
examples: Emmeline Pankhurst was a champion of women's suffrage.

definitions.definition: Someone who fights on another's behalf.
A particularly notable member of a plant species , such as one of great size.

main_definition: An ongoing winner in a game or contest.
secondary_definitions: Someone who is chosen to represent a group of people in a contest.
Someone who fights for a cause or status.
Someone who fights on another's behalf.
( botany ) A particularly notable member of a plant species , such as one of great size.
